attributes.action: simply reduce the cost of petrol.stop ripping us off!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we want the cost of petrol to be reduced. the petrol companies have just announced they have made huge profits. STOP RIPPING US OFF!

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on fuel:
http://tinyurl.com/4gtnck
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
